alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Glascock; Hancock; Jefferson; Twiggs; Warren; Washington; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 3:50PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Baldwin, northern Wilkinson, southern Warren, north central Twiggs, southeastern Hancock, southwestern Glascock, Washington and west central Jefferson Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 350 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Pancras, or 9 miles north of Irwinton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Sandersville, Irwinton, Gordon, Davisboro, Tennille, Ivey, McIntyre, Toomsboro, Oconee, Mitchell, Deepstep, Riddleville, Edge Hill, Edgehill, Hamburg State Park, Shoals, Downs, Jewell, Warthen, and Linton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin; Glascock; Hancock; Jefferson; Twiggs; Warren; Washington; Wilkinson
